lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "Since activities to date have not yet proven to be completely successful and because of timing and resulting additional cost of achieving the leak tightness standard is uncertain, we have no choice but to replace them," Niagara Mohawk said of the ball valves.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The company said it spent considerable time testing and modifying the ball valves which, until recently, "demonstrated potential for both improvement in performance and in ease of maintenance."

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: This has increased the minimum overall disallowances under the settlement Nine Mile Two's owners reached with New York state regulators to over 2.1 billion dlrs, it added.
